all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Every man seeking the interest of his neighbor, and doing all things with an eye single to the glory of God.
Doctrine and Covenants 82:19
Quote of the Day
"Consistent, personal, private acts of devotion invite the Holy Ghost to guide us."
Elder Dale G. Renlund | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
